Correct bos.aso lppchk -vm3 issue

## Prerequisites…. The upgrade has sucessfully completed
## Prerequisites…. Make sure that you have successfully rebootesd the server and that the oslevel -s command shows 7100-03-04-1441
## Prerequisites…. All other steps for the upgrade must be completed and tested, ssh keys copied. etc….
## Prerequisites…, The obly issue should be that the lpshc -vm3 shows e problem with bos.aso

  1. On the server that you just upgraded, mount the lppsource that was used for the upgrade from pgnmsv01 and change direct to it. 
     mount pgnmsv01:/prod/images/lppsr/710TL03-04 /mnt 
    cd /mnt
  2. from the command line
     smitty
  3. Select “Install and Update from ALL Available Software”
  4. enter ”.” for current directory, remember yo did cd to this directory earlier.
  5. press F4 and do a search for bos.aso from the drop down list. select 
     bos.aso                                                            ALL
+ 7.1.3.30  Active System Optimizer                                  
@ 7.1.3.15  Active System Optimizer
  6. select 7.1.3.30 Active System Optimizer and press enter
  7. On the menu change the following options. 
    AUTOMATICALLY install requisite software?           no
    OVERWRITE same or newer versions?                   yes
    ACCEPT new license agreements?                      yes
  8. Press enter to continue, This will overwrite the existing version with the base code.
  9. Once this has completed. retrun to the Inatall and Update Sofware Menu and selsct 
      Update Installed Software to Latest Level (Update All)
  10. again enter ”.” at the pronpet and press enter
  11. change the following options 
     ACCEPT new license agreements?                      yes

    and press enter to continue. This will apply the update to the bos.aso
